## 1. Introduction to Dataset

The aim of this project is to develop two predictive models to determine employee attrition of a company. The dataset[^dataset] used for this project is a simulated dataset designed for the analysis and prediction of employee attrition/ It contains detailed information about various aspects of an employee's profile, including demographics, job-related features, and personal circumstances.

[^dataset]: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/stealthtechnologies/employee-attrition-dataset/data
